provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Metal and Jewellery short title.
(Control of Second-hand) Act.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In this Act “jewellery” includes precious and semi- Interpre-
precious stones and all articles of personal use or adornment tation-

        (3) Where pursuant to the provisions of subsection
(1) or subsection (2) any second-hand metal or second-hand
jewellery is taken before a Clerk of the Courts, he shall
issue a summons requiring the licensee of the premises
upon which such second-hand metal or second-hand jewel-
lery was found or the person upon whom such second-hand
metal or second-hand jewellery was found (as the case may
be) to appear before the Resident Magistrate at a time and
place specified in the summons to account for his possession
of such second-hand metal or second-hand jewellery.
        (4)Every licensee or person upon whom any second-
hand metal or second-hand jewellery is found who fails to
satisfy any Resident Magistrate that his possession of such
second-hand metal or second-hand jewellery was lawfully
obtained shall be guilty of an offence against this Act.

provisions.title: Section 14
provisions.content:
14. Every person who acts in contravention of any of the Penaltyfor
provisions of this Act for which no special punishment is offences.
provided by this Act, shall be guilty of an offence against
this Act and shall upon summary conviction before a
Resident Magistrate be liable to a fine not exceeding two
hundred dollars or to imprisonment for any term not
exceeding twelve months or to both such fine and such
imprisonment.

provisions.title: Section 15
